hostNotes.text:
Welcome. I am X and today we will work for around 30 minutes on xx

We’ll be doing xx ex. meditation followed by time for reflection and sharing with each other.

Let’s start with a mini check-in. How are you feeling right now? Please answer in two-three words. X, would you like to start?

> Let everyone in the session, including yourself, check in one by one.

Thank you all for checking in. Let’s get started.

content.text: Music can help guide us to experiences and see things from a different light. This exercise is about letting hope in, and letting it guide us to things we want to change.

hostNotes.text:
Find a comfortable position. I will start the audio exercise and we'll meet back here afterwards. 

> Push play to start the audio exercise

Now we’ll take 1 minute to reflect on our own.

xxMain question

xxFurther explanations of main question if needed

You can take notes on a piece of paper or just mental notes in your head. And there is no right or wrong here, our answers are our own. 1 minute starting now.

> Press play to start the timer.

That’s 1 minute and it’s time to move on.

content.heading: What did this exercise awake in you?

hostNotes.text:
Now we are getting into the sharing part. We have three rules for sharing:

1. **What is said in here, stays in here.**
2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

There will be a timer set for 2 minutes as an indicator. If you don’t want to share you can always say ‘pass’.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

content.heading: What did this exercise awake in you?

hostNotes.text:
Well done. If you’re up for it, you can continue what we started here today with a mission to bring this into your everyday life.

xx mission description

Before we leave this space let’s do a mini check-out. 

How are you feeling right now? Has anything shifted? Please answer in two-three words.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone in the session check out one by one.

Thank you all for checking out and for joining this session today.

> Finish session to send everyone off to the exit experience.

content.text:
Well done.

Visualizing hope and light, even in times of darkness, can help guide our footsteps towards the change we might want to see in ourselves. If you are up for it, here's a mission for you: Remind yourself of the image that you created of light and hope, once a day for the coming three days. Notice how it affects you.

en.name: PsyPal Hope

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

en.description: Visualize your heart igniting light and hope in this exercise, guided by music.

content.text: Bem-vindo de volta. Exercícios de imagética com a ajuda da música podem-nos ajudar a ver as coisas sob uma luz diferente e influenciar o nosso humor positivamente.

pt.name: Esperança

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

pt.description:
A música é uma aliada poderosa que pode guiar os nossos sentimentos e pensamentos, e ajudar-nos a imaginar as coisas de forma diferente.

No exercício de hoje, será guiado(a) a visualizar a esperança.

content.text: Forestil dig, at du har et indre lys. Lad dit indre lys blive til håb i denne visualiseringsøvelse, som er guidet af musik.

content.text: Velkommen tilbage. Visualisering med hjælp fra musik kan hjælpe os med at se tingene i et andet lys og ændre vores humør til det bedre.

da.name: Håb

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

da.description:
Musik har en særlig evne til guide vores følelser og tanker, og til at hjælpe os med at forestille os ting på nye måder.

I dagens øvelse, vil du blive guidet til at forestille dig håb.

content.text:
Vítejte zpět. 

Vizualizace s pomocí hudby může pomoci vidět věci v jiném světle a změnit naši náladu k lepšímu.

cs.name: Naděje

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

cs.description:
Hudba je naším mocným spojencem a může pomoci vést naše pocity a myšlenky, abychom viděli věci jinak.

Dnešní cvičení věnujeme tématu naděje.

content.text:
Welkom terug. 

Oefenen met beelden en muziek kan ons helpen om dingen anders te zien en ons beter te voelen.

nl.name: Hoop

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

nl.description:
Muziek is een goede hulp die ons kan helpen onze gevoelens en gedachten te sturen, zodat we dingen anders kunnen zien.

Vandaag gaan we een oefening doen waarin ik je help om een gevoel van hoop voor te stellen.
